column4: News;Phnom Penh: According to preliminary reports from the MoI
column5: immigration police deported  69 Chinese on the morning of January 28
column7: in cooperation with Chinese authorities.------Among the 69 Chinese nationals
column9: were those arrested on------ 21 January 2019 in Bavet City
column10: Svay Rieng------ Province on charges of VoIP scams in China.
